verses.content: Chun, Josef chu a kâwla ngîr po pohai hmaa chun ân sûm zo ta nawh a, “Mi po po ka kuoma inthawk hin infe suoktir vawng ro,” tiin a khêk a.
Chuongchun, Josef a unauhai kuoma ân hriettir sûng po a kâwlah tukhawm an ngîr nawh. Chun, a ṭap ta rak rak a, chuongchun, Aigupta mihai chun an hriet a. Pharao sûnghai khawmin an hriet bawk a.
Chun, Josef chun a unauhai kuom- ah, “Josef kha ka nih, ka pa chu a la dam maw?” a tih a. Nisienlakhawm, a unauhai chun an dawn thei nawh a, a hmaa chun lungzîngtaka an um leiin.
Josef bawkin a unauhai kuomah, “Lunginsiettakin mi hung hnai ta u,” a tih a. Chuongchun, an va hnai a. Ama chun, “In unaupa Josef, Aiguptaa lûtpui dinga in izawr kha ka nih.
Tuhin hitaka fe dinga in mi zawr leiin lungngai naw ro, nangni le nangni intheida bawk naw ro: mihai hringna sanhim dingin Pathienin in hmaah a mi tir hmasa a ni hi.
Hi kum hni sûng hi hi rama hin ṭâm a hung tla tah a: kum nga a la bâk a, chu sûng po chu hnuoi inlet um naw nih a, bu sîk khawm um naw bawk a tih.
Chuongchun, hnuoia hin chithla- hai hlapêk ding cheu le, sanhimna ropuitaka in ta dinga mi tamtak sanhim ding cheuin, Pathienin in hmaah a mi lo tir hmasa a nih.
Chuongchun, hitaka mîn kaitirtu hi nangni in ni nawh a, Pathien a ni lem, ama chun Pharao paa le a sûnghai po po hotuah le Aigupta ram po po rorêltuah a mi siem tah a.
Inhmâwtakin ka pa kuomah hang fe unla, a kuomaah, ‘I naupa Josef chun hieng ang hin a tih, Pathienin Aigupta ram po po hotuah a mi siem tah a, ka kuomah hung thla rawh, sâwt hung riel naw rawh;
Gosen ramah um i ta, ka kâwl hnaiah i um ding a nih, nang le i nauhai le i tuhai leh, i berâm ruolhai le i bâwng ruolhai leh, i nei po pohai leh;
chutaka chun keiin châwm ka ti cheh a, ṭâm ding kum nga a la um sih a; chuong naw chun nang le i sûnghai le, i nei po po rimsi rawi in tih,’ ti ro.
Tuhin nangni mit ngei le, ka sangpa Benjamin mit ngeiin, keia bau ngeiin a hril ti in hmu hi.
Aigupta rama ka ropuina po po thu le, in thil hmu po po thu hi ka pa hril in ta, ka pa chu inhmâwtakin hitaka hin in hung ṭhuoi thlâk ding a nih,” a tih a.
Chun, a ir le a sang Benjamin ir chu suktuoin a ṭap bawk a.
Chun, a unauhai po po chu a fâwp a, a ṭap khum seng tah a; chu hnunga chun, a unauhai chun thukhawchâng an hrilpui tah a.
Chun, “Josef unauhai an hung,” ti thuthang Pharao ina an lo hriet chun Pharao le a siehlawhai a suklâwm hleh a.
Pharao chun Josef kuomah, “I unauhai kuomah, ‘Hieng hin thaw ro, in sahai bu inphurtir unla, Kanaan ramah fe ro:
chun, in pa le in sûnghai chu hung ṭhuoi unla, ka kuoma hin hung ro; chuongchun, Aigupta ram ṭhatna lai tak pêng ka ti cheu a, chu rama thil ṭha takhai chu in fâk ding a nih,’ ti rawh.
Chun, hieng ang hin hril bawk la: in nauhai ta ding le in nuhmeihai ta dingin Aigupta rama inthawk hin tawlailîrhai lain fe unla, in pa ṭhuoiin hung ro.
In thuomhnaw khawm ngaituo nuom naw ro, Aigupta ram po poa thil ṭha taphawt hi in ta a ni sih a, tiin,” a tih a.
Chuongchun, Israel nauhai chun chuong ang chun an thawh a: chun, Josef chun Pharao thupêk ang chun tawlailîrhai a pêk a, lampuia dingin fâk ding a pêk bawk a.
An rênga kuomah silfên in- thlengna ding a pêk seng a; Benjamin kuoma lem chu tangka za thum le silfên inthlengna panga a pêk a.
Chun, an pa kuoma chun sabengtung sâwm Aigupta rama thil ṭha phur le, sabengtungpui sâwm, bu le bei le, lampuia a pa ta dinga mamaw danghai phur ân phur a.
Chun, a unauhai chu a tir suok a, an fe tah a: chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Lampuia inhal lo dingin fimkhur ro,” a tih a.
Chuongchun, Aiguptaa inthawk chu an fe tung a, Kanaan rama, an pa Jakob kuom chu an hang tlung a.
A kuomah, “Josef kha a la dam a, Aigupta ram po po rorêltu a nih,” tiin an hril a. Chun, a lung chu a chau sul a, an thu hril chu a awi si nawh a.
Chun, a kuomah Josef thu hril po po chu an hril a; a chuongna ding tawlailîrhai Josefin a inphur chu a hmu chun an pa Jakob lungril chu a har ta huoi a:
chun, Israel chun, “A hun tah ie, ka naupa Josef chu damin a la um a ni tak tak hi: ka thi hmain ama zu hmûng ka tih,” a ti tah a.
